Description_lang: Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.

description_blz.en_US: Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.
description_blz.es_MX: Penitencia lanza un rayo adicional de Luz Sagrada mientras dure.
description_blz.pt_BR: Penitência dispara um raio de luz sagrada adicional por toda a duração.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Sühne' feuert während der Kanalisierungsdauer einen zusätzlichen heiligen Blitz ab.
description_blz.en_GB: Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.
description_blz.es_ES: Penitencia dispara una descarga adicional de Luz Sagrada mientras dura.
description_blz.fr_FR: Pénitence tire un trait de lumière sacrée supplémentaire pendant sa durée.
description_blz.it_IT: Contrizione lancia un dardo aggiuntivo di Luce sacra nel corso della sua durata.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Исповедь" в течение своего времени действия посылает в цель дополнительный заряд энергии света.
description_blz.ko_KR: 회개가 지속시간에 걸쳐 신성한 빛의 화살을 하나 더 발사합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 懺悟在持續時間內額外發出一道聖光。
description_blz.zh_CN: 苦修可在持续时间内多发射一支圣光箭。
